body_html:
This problem is described in #4920
The solution proposed is to do "while exception: try initialize", which is guaranteed to eventually succeed because at each iteration at least one more variable gets initialized. Because of Moore's law, the performance will eventually become acceptable, therefore please integrate this into TensorFlow, kthanksbye

body:
This problem is described in https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/4920
The solution proposed is to do "while exception: try initialize", which is guaranteed to eventually succeed because at each iteration at least one more variable gets initialized. Because of Moore's law, the performance will eventually become acceptable, therefore please integrate this into TensorFlow, kthanksbye
